item.description:
Please join us for this special event - esp if you have a young woman in your life!

Film starts @ 7pm followed by a panel of guest speakers discussing how the unattainable images of beauty contribute to the rise in low self-esteem, body dismorphia & eating disorders for women and girls.

America the Beautiful

Filmmaker Darryl Robert goes on a two year journey examining America's obsession with physical perfection. The film unearths the secrets, confessions & strikingly harsh realities of the origins and deadly risks of our nation's quest for physical perfection. How do we raise daughters to feel good about themselves when they are expose to 40,000 media messages a year about how to look? Join us for this must see documentary

Suggested $10 donation, $5 students

Special Spa Nite (2-4-1) with Kristy 5-7pm *RSVP to kristyl03@cox.net
Come with a friend and pay for only one spa treatment. Infrared Sauna is FREE with any spa treatment this evening!

Organic Potluck - bring a dish to share! 6:30-7pm

Fundraising Raffle - buy 3 tickets ($5) to win a variety of health & wellness coupons!
item.name: Film Fundraiser: America the Beautiful
